message_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
message_error_not_found: The requested item was not found.
message_error_unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
message_error_validation: Please check the form for errors.
message_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
form_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
auth_login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth_register_description: Enter your information to get started

profile_info_description: Your personal information and account details
profile_change_password_description: Update your password to keep your account secure
setup_description: Complete the initial setup to create your super admin account
setup_wizard_notice: This setup wizard will only appear once. Make sure to save your credentials.
setup_link_expiry: This link will expire in 24 hours. If expired, restart the server to generate a new link.
setup_error_failed: Failed to complete setup. Please try again.
setup_error_default_message: An error occurred while accessing the setup page.
setup_error_not_found_message: Setup link not found. Please check the URL or request a new setup link.
setup_error_used_message: This setup link has already been used. Please login with your admin account.
setup_error_expired_message: This setup link has expired. Please restart the server to generate a new link.
setup_new_link_hint: If you need a new setup link, restart the server and check the console output.
billing_select_edition: Select an edition to manage ticket types, orders, and check-in.
billing_create_edition: Create an edition to start managing tickets.
billing_create_ticket_type: Create your first ticket type to start selling tickets.
billing_define_ticket_type: Define a new ticket type for this edition.
billing_checkin_point_camera: Point camera at the QR code
billing_stats_by_ticket_type_desc: Check-in progress for each ticket category
billing_design_colors_desc: Customize the colors used in your ticket design.
billing_design_logo_desc: Upload a logo to display on your tickets. Recommended size: 200x80px.
billing_design_display_options_desc: Choose what information to display on the ticket.
billing_design_preview_desc: This is how your tickets will appear in emails and PDFs.
billing_design_tip_colors: Use contrasting colors for better readability. The header text color is automatically calculated based on the primary color.
billing_design_tip_logo: For best results, use a transparent PNG with your logo on a light background. The logo will be resized to fit.
billing_design_tip_qr: The QR code contains the ticket ID and is used for check-in. We recommend keeping it enabled.
billing_participants_marked_paid: Order marked as paid. Tickets generated.
billing_settings_public_page_desc: Share this URL with attendees to let them purchase tickets.
billing_settings_not_published: This edition is not published. The ticket page will return a 404 until the edition status is set to "published".
billing_settings_sales_status_desc: Overview of your ticket sales configuration.
billing_settings_publish_required: Edition must be published for sales to be active.
billing_settings_no_active_types: No active ticket types. Enable at least one ticket type.
billing_settings_types_active: Ticket types are active and edition is published.
billing_settings_integrations_desc: Status of external service connections. Configure via environment variables.
billing_settings_stripe_desc: Process paid ticket orders via Stripe Checkout.
billing_settings_webhook_desc: Receive payment confirmation events from Stripe.
billing_settings_email_desc: Send order confirmations and tickets via email.
billing_settings_stripe_info_desc: Without Stripe, paid orders are automatically completed in development mode. Set STRIPE_SECRET_KEY and STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET environment variables for production payments.
billing_tickets_not_on_sale: Tickets are not yet on sale. Check back later.
billing_checkout_info_desc: This information will appear on your tickets.
billing_checkout_email_help: Your tickets will be sent to this email address.
billing_confirmation_tickets_sent: Your tickets have been sent to
billing_confirmation_processing_desc: Your payment is being processed. You'll receive your tickets by email shortly.
billing_confirmation_qr_help: Present these QR codes at the entrance for check-in.
billing_scan_select_edition: Select an edition to start scanning
billing_scan_no_access: Make sure you have access to at least one edition with ticketing enabled.
billing_scan_camera_denied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera access in your browser settings and reload the page.
billing_scan_camera_blocked: Camera blocked by browser policy. Try accessing the page directly (not in an iframe) or use HTTPS.
billing_scan_no_camera: No camera found on this device.
billing_scan_timeout: Camera initialization timed out. Please try again.
cfp_management_description: Select an edition to manage its Call for Papers submissions.
cfp_create_edition_hint: Create and publish an edition to start managing CFP submissions.
cfp_submissions_appear_hint: Submissions will appear here once speakers submit talks.
cfp_detail_speaker_hidden: Speaker information is hidden during anonymous review.
cfp_detail_speaker_reveal_after_decision: Speaker details will be revealed after a decision is made on this talk.
cfp_detail_only_admins_see: Only admins and owners can see speaker details.
cfp_comments_description: Comments are only visible to organizers and reviewers
cfp_comments_no_comments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
cfp_reviews_note_placeholder: Add a note about your rating (optional)...
cfp_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this talk?
cfp_settings_description: Configure the Call for Papers for {name}
cfp_settings_status_description: Control whether this CFP is visible to speakers and accepting submissions
cfp_settings_status_draft_hint: CFP not visible, no submissions allowed.
cfp_settings_submission_description: Configure submission dates, limits, and form requirements
cfp_settings_open_date_hint: When speakers can start submitting talks
cfp_settings_intro_hint: This text will be displayed on the CFP submission page
cfp_settings_anonymous_review: Anonymous review (hide speaker names from reviewers)
cfp_settings_reveal_after_decision: Reveal speaker names after decision is made
cfp_settings_reveal_hint: When enabled, reviewers will see speaker information once a talk is accepted or rejected
cfp_settings_review_stars_hint: Classic rating scale from 1 to 5 stars
cfp_settings_review_yes_no_hint: Simple binary decision - accept or reject
cfp_settings_review_comparative_hint: Rank talks relative to each other on a 0-100 scale
cfp_categories_description: Topics and tracks for talk submissions
cfp_categories_empty: No categories yet. Add categories so speakers can classify their talks.
cfp_formats_description: Duration and types of talks accepted
cfp_formats_empty: No formats yet. Add formats so speakers can choose the type of talk they want to give.
cfp_conditional_description: Show or hide form fields based on speaker selections
cfp_conditional_empty: No conditional field rules yet. Add rules to show or hide fields based on the speaker's selections (e.g., show "Duration" only when format is "Workshop").
cfp_conditional_show_when: Show "{field}" when {logic} of {count} condition(s) is/are met
cfp_conditional_show_field_hint: The field that will be shown/hidden based on conditions
cfp_conditional_conditions_met: of the following conditions are met:
cfp_related_description: Manage other aspects of this edition
cfp_public_cfp_will_open: The Call for Papers will open on {date}.
cfp_public_cfp_closed_on: The Call for Papers closed on {date}. Thank you to all who submitted!
cfp_public_days_remaining: Only {count} day(s) left to submit your proposal. Deadline: {date}
cfp_public_categories_hint: We're looking for talks in the following topics
cfp_submit_about_you_hint: Tell us about yourself so attendees can learn more about you
cfp_submit_your_talk_hint: Describe the talk you'd like to present
cfp_speaker_email_readonly: Email cannot be changed after submission.
cfp_talk_abstract_placeholder: A brief summary of your talk (50-500 characters)...
cfp_talk_description_placeholder: A detailed description of your talk (optional)...
cfp_talk_notes_placeholder: Any additional information for the organizers (availability, special requirements, etc.)...
cfp_talk_prerequisites_placeholder: What should attendees know before attending this session?
cfp_talk_required_materials_placeholder: What materials or tools should attendees bring?
cfp_talk_mentor_request: I would like a mentor to help prepare my talk
cfp_talk_mentor_hint: We can pair you with an experienced speaker to help you prepare
cfp_submissions_access_hint: Enter your email address and we'll send you a secure link to view and manage your submissions.
cfp_submissions_no_talks_hint: You haven't submitted any talks for this edition.
cfp_submissions_cospeakers_empty: No co-speakers yet. Invite someone to collaborate!
cfp_submissions_accepted_message: Congratulations! Your talk has been accepted. Please confirm your participation.
cfp_submissions_invalid_link_hint: This access link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
cfp_submissions_success_submitted: Your talk has been submitted successfully! Check your email for the access link.
planning_description: Select an edition to manage its schedule, rooms, and tracks.

planning_schedule_no_rooms_hint: Go to the Rooms tab to add rooms before creating your schedule.

planning_sessions_available_talks_desc: Accepted talks that have not yet been scheduled
planning_sessions_no_accepted_talks: No accepted talks yet. Accept talks from the CFP to schedule them.
planning_sessions_all_scheduled: All accepted talks have been scheduled.
planning_sessions_scheduled_desc: All sessions currently in the schedule
planning_sessions_no_scheduled: No sessions scheduled yet. Click on empty slots in the Schedule tab to add sessions.
planning_rooms_no_rooms_hint: Add your first room to get started.
planning_tracks_no_tracks_hint: Create tracks to organize your sessions by topic.
planning_slots_no_slots_hint: Create time slots to define when sessions can occur.
planning_slots_add_rooms_first_hint: You need to create rooms before adding time slots.

planning_staff_date_hint: Leave empty for all edition days

sponsoring_select_edition: Select an edition to manage sponsors, packages, and sponsorship pipeline.

sponsoring_pipeline_add_hint: Add sponsors to this edition to start building your pipeline.
sponsoring_sponsor_form_desc_new: Create a new sponsor in your organization.
sponsoring_add_to_edition_desc: Select a sponsor and optionally assign a package.
sponsoring_sponsors_empty_hint: Create sponsors from the dashboard to manage your sponsor database.
sponsoring_packages_empty_hint: Create sponsorship packages with different tiers and benefits.
sponsoring_inquiries_empty_hint: Sponsor inquiries will appear here when submitted through the public form.
sponsoring_inquiry_detail_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this inquiry? This action cannot be undone.
sponsoring_deliverables_no_confirmed_hin: Deliverables can only be created for confirmed sponsors. Confirm sponsors in the pipeline first.
sponsoring_deliverables_no_deliverables: No deliverables yet. Click "Generate" to create from package benefits.

sponsoring_deliverables_add_custom_desc: Create a custom deliverable for this sponsor.
sponsoring_deliverables_delivered_notifi: Marking as "Delivered" will send an email notification to the sponsor.
sponsoring_assets_empty_hint: Confirmed sponsors have not uploaded any assets yet.
sponsoring_assets_preview_not_available: Preview not available for this file type
sponsoring_messages_no_sponsors: No sponsors added to this edition yet
sponsoring_messages_detail_start_convers: Start the conversation with this sponsor
crm_description: Select an event to manage its contacts, segments, and imports.
crm_create_event_hint: Create an event to start managing contacts.
crm_contacts_search_placeholder: Search by name, email, or company...
crm_contacts_adjust_filter: Try adjusting your search or filter.
crm_contacts_sync_or_import: Sync from your events or import contacts to get started.
crm_contact_danger_confirm_text: This will permanently delete this contact and all associated data (consents, edition links). This action cannot be undone.
crm_segments_edit_description: Update the segment details and criteria.

crm_segments_no_segments_hint: Create a segment to group and filter your contacts.
crm_segments_no_rules: No rules defined. Add a rule to filter contacts.
crm_import_page_title: Import / Export - CRM - Open Event Orchestrator
crm_import_description: Upload a CSV file or paste CSV data to import contacts.
crm_import_csv_help: Required columns: email, firstName (or first_name), lastName (or last_name). Optional: company, jobTitle, phone, city, country, tags.
crm_import_strategy_skip: Skip - Do not update existing contacts
crm_export_description: Export your contacts as a CSV file.
crm_email_editor_blocks_hint: Drag and drop to add blocks
crm_email_editor_select_block: Select a block to edit its properties
crm_email_editor_empty_canvas: Drag and drop blocks here to start building your email
budget_select_edition: Select an edition to manage its budget, categories, and transactions.
budget_create_edition: Create an edition to start managing budgets.
budget_no_categories_hint: Add a category to start tracking budget items.
budget_no_transactions_hint: Add a transaction to start tracking expenses and income.
budget_no_budget_hint: Initialize a budget to start tracking expenses and income for this edition.
budget_journal_no_logs_hint: Financial operations will be logged here
budget_invoices_no_invoices_hint: Upload an invoice to attach it to a transaction.
budget_invoices_attach: Attach an invoice to a budget transaction.
budget_quotes_no_quotes_hint: Create your first quote to start tracking vendor proposals.
budget_quotes_convert_description: Create a budget transaction from quote {number}. This will create a pending expense of {amount}.
budget_reimbursements_no_requests_hint: No speakers have submitted reimbursement requests for this edition yet.
budget_reimbursements_no_items: No expense items attached to this request.
budget_reimbursements_category_hint: The expense transaction will be created under this budget category.
budget_reimbursements_reject_reason_plac: Please provide a reason for rejecting this request...
budget_reimbursements_reject_reason_hint: This message will be visible to the speaker.
budget_checklist_no_items_hint: Add items to track budget requirements for this edition.
budget_checklist_add_item_hint: Add a new budget checklist item.
budget_checklist_template_description: Select a template to add pre-defined checklist items.
budget_checklist_multiplier_hint: Used for items with variable costs (e.g., cost per attendee)
budget_profitability_intro_text: This dashboard shows your event's profitability based on ticket sales, sponsorships, and planned expenses. The break-even point tells you how many attendees you need to cover your costs. Use the forecast to see if you're on track to meet your financial goals.
budget_profitability_profit_description: Total revenue minus all costs. A positive number means profit.
budget_profitability_costs_description: All expenses including venue, catering, speakers, etc.
budget_profitability_breakeven_reached: You've reached break-even! Every additional ticket is pure profit.
budget_profitability_breakeven_needed: {count} more attendees needed to cover costs.
budget_profitability_cost_breakdown_hint: Track your expenses against your budget. Green is good, red means over budget.
budget_profitability_variance_positive: You have room in your budget
budget_profitability_variance_negative: You are spending more than planned
budget_profitability_forecast_hint: Based on current trends, here's where your event is heading financially.
budget_simulator_ticket_estimates_hint: Enter expected sales for each ticket type
budget_simulator_no_ticket_types: No ticket types defined for this edition.
budget_simulator_summary_with_types: With {attendees} attendees across {types} ticket types (avg. {price}/ticket) and {sponsorship} in sponsorships:
budget_simulator_summary_legacy: With {attendees} attendees at {price} per ticket and {sponsorship} in sponsorships:
budget_simulator_save_description: Save this simulation as a scenario for future reference.
budget_settings_status_description: Control whether this budget is in draft, approved or closed
budget_settings_status_draft: Draft: Budget is being prepared, editable.
budget_settings_status_approved: Approved: Budget is finalized and active.
budget_settings_status_closed: Closed: Budget is locked, no further changes.
budget_settings_details_description: Configure the total budget amount and currency
budget_settings_total_budget_hint: The overall budget envelope for this edition
budget_settings_notes_hint: Internal notes about this budget (not visible publicly)
budget_settings_related_description: Manage other aspects of this edition
budget_templates_no_templates_hint: Create templates to quickly set up budget checklists for new editions.
budget_templates_default_hint: These are the built-in templates. Use "Seed Defaults" to create them in your database.
budget_templates_create_description: Create a reusable template for budget checklists.
budget_templates_no_items: No items added yet. Click "Add Item" to start.

reporting_no_data_hint: Metrics will be available once data has been added.
reporting_alerts_create_edition_hint: Create an edition for this event to configure alerts.

reporting_thresholds_empty_hint: Add thresholds to receive alerts when metrics cross certain values
reporting_thresholds_preset_low_sales_de: Alert when ticket sales are below target

reporting_thresholds_preset_pending_revi: Alert when too many talks await review
reporting_thresholds_preset_low_acceptan: Alert when CFP acceptance rate is low
reporting_thresholds_preset_budget_overr: Alert when budget utilization exceeds limit

reporting_reports_form_recipients_hint: Select which roles receive the report

admin_settings_smtp_disabled_hint: When disabled, emails will be logged to the console instead of being sent.
admin_settings_smtp_password_keep: Leave empty to keep current password.
admin_settings_smtp_from_hint: The sender address displayed in outgoing emails.
admin_settings_test_email_description: Verify your SMTP configuration by sending a test email.
admin_organizations_description: Manage your organizations. Each organization can have multiple events.
admin_organizations_create_description: Organizations group related events together. You can add team members and manage permissions per organization.

admin_org_settings_email_hint: An invitation will be sent if the user doesn't have an account
admin_org_settings_role_organizer: Organizer - Can manage events and CFP
admin_org_settings_role_admin: Admin - Full access except delete organization
admin_org_settings_no_members: No team members yet. Add members to collaborate on events.
admin_org_settings_delete_has_events: Cannot delete: {count} event(s) exist. Delete events first.
admin_org_settings_delete_description: Permanently delete this organization and remove all team members.
admin_org_settings_vat_rate_hint: Default VAT rate applied to sponsor invoices. Set to 0 for VAT-exempt organizations.
admin_org_settings_legal_description: Legal information displayed on invoices and credit notes.

admin_events_create_description: Events can have multiple editions (yearly occurrences).
admin_events_create_org_first: Please create an organization first before creating an event.

admin_edition_settings_danger_descriptio: Irreversible actions that affect this edition
admin_edition_settings_delete_descriptio: Permanently delete this edition and all its associated data. This action cannot be undone.
admin_edition_settings_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
admin_team_import_description: Select members from your organization to add to this edition's team
admin_team_empty_description_with_org: Import members from your organization or add new ones manually.

admin_integrations_description: Connect and manage third-party services for your event platform.
admin_stripe_description: Configure Stripe for payment processing and ticket sales.
admin_stripe_api_keys_description: Enter your Stripe API keys. You can find them in the
admin_stripe_enable_hint: When disabled, ticket purchases and payment processing will be unavailable.
admin_stripe_webhook_secret_hint: Found in your webhook endpoint settings. Starts with whsec_
admin_stripe_keep_current: Leave fields empty to keep current values.
admin_stripe_test_description: Verify your Stripe API credentials by testing the connection.
admin_stripe_save_first: Save a secret key first to test the connection.
admin_stripe_webhook_description: Configure this URL in your Stripe dashboard to receive payment events.
admin_slack_description: Configure Slack webhook notifications for your events.
admin_slack_webhook_description: Enter your Slack webhook URL. You can create a webhook in your Slack workspace under Apps > Incoming Webhooks.
admin_slack_enable_hint: When disabled, Slack notifications will not be sent.
admin_slack_default_channel_hint: The default channel for notifications. Leave empty for webhook default.
admin_slack_keep_current: Leave webhook URL field empty to keep the current value.
admin_slack_test_description: Send a test message to verify your Slack webhook is working correctly.
admin_slack_save_first: Save a webhook URL first to test the connection.
admin_slack_setup_title: How to Create a Slack Webhook
admin_slack_setup_step1: Go to api.slack.com/apps and create or select an app
admin_slack_setup_step2: Enable Incoming Webhooks for your app
admin_slack_setup_step3: Click Add New Webhook to Workspace
admin_slack_setup_step4: Select the channel where you want notifications to appear
admin_slack_setup_step5: Click Allow to authorize the webhook
admin_slack_setup_step6: Copy the Webhook URL and paste it above
admin_slack_setup_note: Note: Slack webhooks are tied to a specific channel during creation. You can override this with the Default Channel setting above.
admin_discord_description: Configure Discord webhook notifications for your events.
admin_discord_webhook_description: Enter your Discord webhook URL. You can create a webhook in your Discord server settings under Integrations > Webhooks.
admin_discord_enable_hint: When disabled, Discord notifications will not be sent.
admin_discord_bot_username_hint: The display name for notifications in Discord. Leave empty for default.
admin_discord_keep_current: Leave webhook URL field empty to keep the current value.
admin_discord_test_description: Send a test message to verify your Discord webhook is working correctly.
admin_discord_save_first: Save a webhook URL first to test the connection.
admin_discord_setup_title: How to Create a Discord Webhook
admin_discord_setup_step1: Open your Discord server and go to Server Settings
admin_discord_setup_step3: Click New Webhook or select an existing one
admin_discord_setup_step4: Choose the channel where you want notifications to appear
admin_discord_setup_step5: Click Copy Webhook URL and paste it above
admin_discord_setup_note: Note: Discord webhooks are specific to a channel. Create separate webhooks for different notification channels if needed.
verify_email_success_message: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now access all features of your account.
verify_email_error_message: We couldn't verify your email address. The link may have expired or is invalid.

api_description: Manage API keys, webhooks, and access the API documentation.

api_keys_delete_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.
api_keys_new_title: Create API Key - Open Event Orchestrator
api_keys_new_description: Generate a new API key for programmatic access
api_keys_new_success_description: Copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
api_keys_new_store_securely_description: This is the only time you'll see this API key. Store it in a secure location like a password manager or environment variable.
api_keys_new_name_hint: A descriptive name to identify this key
api_keys_new_rate_limit_hint: Maximum number of API requests per minute
api_webhooks_description: Configure event notifications to external services
api_webhooks_no_webhooks_description: Set up webhooks to receive notifications when events occur.
api_webhooks_delete_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to delete this webhook? All delivery history will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
api_webhooks_new_description: Set up event notifications to an external URL
api_webhooks_new_success_description: Copy your webhook secret now. You won't be able to see it again!
api_webhooks_new_secret_hint_title: Use this secret to verify webhook signatures
api_webhooks_new_secret_hint_description: Each webhook request includes an X-OEO-Signature header with an HMAC-SHA256 signature. Use this secret to verify that requests are coming from Open Event Orchestrator.
api_webhooks_new_name_hint: A descriptive name to identify this webhook
api_webhooks_new_url_hint: The URL where webhook events will be sent via POST request
api_webhooks_new_retries_hint: Number of retry attempts if delivery fails (exponential backoff)
admin_app_description: Configure the mobile PWA experience for your event attendees.
admin_app_create_edition_hint: Create an edition to configure its attendee app.
admin_app_reset_dialog_description: This will reset all app settings (appearance, features, and feedback) to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
admin_app_branding_description: Customize how your app looks to attendees
admin_app_title_hint: Leave empty to use edition name
admin_app_logo_hint: PNG, JPG, WebP or SVG. Max 2MB.
admin_app_tabs_description: Choose which tabs to show in the attendee app
admin_app_tab_schedule_description: Event schedule with sessions and rooms (always enabled)
admin_app_tab_speakers_description: List of speakers with their talks
admin_app_tab_my_ticket_description: Ticket lookup and QR code display
admin_app_tab_favorites_description: Allow attendees to save favorite sessions
admin_app_session_ratings_description: Allow attendees to rate individual sessions
admin_app_enable_session_ratings_hint: Attendees can rate sessions in the app
admin_app_enable_event_feedback_hint: Show feedback forms in the Feedback tab
admin_app_intro_text_placeholder: We value your feedback! Help us improve future events.
